name: Sera-Brynn
tagline: Cyber security demands a holistic approach
description:
Sera-Brynn is a leading cybersecurity audit and advisory firm. Founded in 2011 by former members of the U.S. intelligence community, Sera-Brynn is ranked #10 worldwide on the Cybersecurity 500 list and is known for its compliance and cyber risk management services.Â 
Our team is made up of security engineers, computer forensics examiners, security consultants, certified compliance auditors, security researchers, and trainers with in-depth expertise and decades of experience.
